name: After changing to ”Enable” the Project page get refreshed automatically and the warning message disappear

Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

steps.name: Create Freestyle Project
Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new freestyle project with the name "'New Freestyle Project'".
Input project name "New Freestyle Project".
Select "Freestyle project" type.
Click "OK" button.
Go to the Freestyle Project Configuration page.
Wait for title FreestyleProjectConfigPage
Return FreestyleProjectConfigPage

beforeStages.name: Prepare: make Freestyle Project Enabled automatically

steps.name: Make Freestyle project is disable
Save Freestyle Project as disabled
Click Save Button and go to the Freestyle Project Page.
On Freestyle Project Page click Enable button
Return is visible warning_message: True or False
Go to Freestyle Project Config Page
Return is Freestyle Project is enable: True or False
Assert the warning message disappear
Assert Freestyle Project is enable

afterStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.::0
